DOC.brief_title: Physiotherapy Chronic Shoulder Pain After Breast Cancer Treatment
DOC.detailed_description: Introduction : Studies suggest potential complication today lack sufficient study analysis motor pattern disturbances chronic shoulder pain occur breast cancer treatment . This alteration , maintain permanently , may cause long-term pathology commit locally ( impigement subacromial , retractable capsulitis ... ) global level mean central nervous system . So appear need reconsider issue propose effective physical therapy program solve dysfunction . Subjects method : A randomized clinical trial , examiner blind unaware intervention group subject assign . Participants randomly assign three group : An experimental group , participant treat Invasive Physical Therapy Motor Control Exercises ; Another experimental group realize Motor Control Exercises ; And third group do Shoulder Conventional Exercises . Pre- intervention , immediate post-intervention , 3 , 6 12 month assessment make . All participant must understand sign freely Informed Consent . Sample size : 30 woman group . Data Analysis : A descriptive analysis variable perform . It establish case confidence level 95 % ( p < 0.05 ) . The effectiveness assess comparing experienced change three goups outcome variable physicaltherapy examination .
